column3: as Mid-years Day. Loëndë was the day that fell in the middle of the year in many of the calendars of Middle-earth. Since Mid-years Day in the Shire Calendar was intended to correspond with the wikipedia:Solstice
column4: then this should apply to loëndë in the Kings Reckoning and Stewards Reckoning calendars of Gondor as well. In the New Reckoning
column5: loëndë corresponded with 24 September in the Shire Calendar.
